Jizo No Akumu

Gameplay Programmer

September 2023 - December 2023

Project Team: USC Thesis Game

Genre: Third-Person Adventure

Engine: Unity

Version Control: Perforce

Coding Language: C#

Special Skills: Yarnspinner

Jizo No Akumu is a third-person adventure game where you play as Jizo, a young Japanese girl forced to confront a nightmarish Baku demon in order to save her family.

As a Technical Game Designer I was responsible for:

  • Designing various puzzle concepts and environments
  • Designing enemy AI behaviors for the Baku demon
  • Meeting with the Narrative Team and Art Team to give feedback on their work
  • Implementing character dialogue from the Narrative Team in the tutorial section
